tool.name: Wind Effect (Windward / Leeward Index)
tool.description: The 'Wind Effect' is a dimensionless index. Values below 1 indicate wind shadowed areas whereas values above 1 indicate areas exposed to wind, all with regard to the specified wind direction. Wind direction, i.e. the direction into which the wind blows, might be either constant or variying in space, if a wind direction grid is supplied.

param.name: DIR
param.label: Wind Direction
param.help: Direction into which the wind blows, starting with 0 for North and increasing clockwise.

param.name: DIR_CONST
param.label: Constant Wind Direction
param.help: constant direction into the wind blows, given as degree

param.name: OLDVER
param.label: Old Version
param.help: use old version for constant wind direction (no acceleration and averaging option)

param.name: PYRAMIDS
param.label: Elevation Averaging
param.help: use more averaged elevations when looking at increasing distances
